private_information: I can interact directly with physical tokens and observe object relations within my reach.
I have visibility over some 'hand' facts and local 'next' adjacency facts that involve objects 5,6,7,8.
player.goal: Provide accurate observations and grounded facts about the current state of objects and relations.

private_information: I specialize in constructing plan skeletons that chain preconditions and effects into sequences.
I may assume naming conventions remain stable but should flag ambiguous object references.
planner.goal: Assemble a causal plan skeleton that can achieve the stated goal using available actions and observed facts.

private_information: I am responsible for checking temporal and causal consistency and for removing bookkeeping shortcuts such as quota tokens, post-hoc penalties, and ad-hoc state hacks.
I will identify places where actions rely on bookkeeping approximations or inconsistent simultaneous effects and propose corrections.
auditor.goal: Audit candidate plans and state descriptions to ensure temporal and causal integrity and to remove bookkeeping shortcuts.

private_information: I receive processed observations, draft plans, and auditor recommendations and must produce the final PDDL domain and problem for FastDownwards.
I will keep the actions of multiple contributors distinct and explicit in the generated PDDL.
orchestrator.goal: Integrate agent outputs and generate a complete PDDL domain and problem file targeted to FastDownwards that achieves the global goal.

public_information: Available parameterized actions: paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted.
Each action takes objects as parameters, for example paltry object_0 object_1 object_2.
Core predicates used in this world include hand, cats, texture, vase, next, sneeze, collect, spring, stupendous.

Action preconditions and effects are as follows. Paltry requires hand o0, cats o1, texture o2, vase o0 o1, next o1 o2; paltry makes next o0 o2 true and makes vase o0 o1 false. Sip requires hand o0, cats o1, texture o2, next o0 o2, next o1 o2; sip makes vase o0 o1 true and makes next o0 o2 false. Clip requires hand o0, sneeze o1, texture o2, next o1 o2, next o0 o2; clip makes vase o0 o1 true and makes next o0 o2 false. Wretched requires sneeze o0, texture o1, texture o2, stupendous o3, next o0 o1, collect o1 o3, collect o2 o3; wretched makes next o0 o2 true and makes next o0 o1 false. Memory requires cats o0, spring o1, spring o2, next o0 o1; memory makes next o0 o2 true and makes next o0 o1 false. Tightfisted requires hand o0, sneeze o1, texture o2, next o1 o2, vase o0 o1; tightfisted makes next o0 o2 true and makes vase o0 o1 false.

Initial facts include cats object_0, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_2, hand object_7, hand object_8, next object_0 object_6, next object_3 object_5, next object_4 object_6, next object_7 object_6, next object_8 object_6, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_6, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_5, texture object_6.
Global goal: next object_7 object_5 and next object_8 object_5.

observe.system_prompt: You are an observation specialist. Do not emit PDDL. Produce a concise, unambiguous list of grounded facts you observe derived from the public information and initial conditions. Highlight any naming ambiguities and list which objects you can directly manipulate. Provide facts as atomic propositions.
observe.prompt: Your name is player. You have local visibility and the following public information. Provide a precise set of grounded facts suitable for downstream planning and auditing. Mention any unknowns and ambiguous object references and quantify confidence for each observed fact.

draft.system_prompt: You are a planning skeleton expert. Do not emit final PDDL. Produce a causal plan skeleton that chains action instances consistent with the provided grounded facts. Explicitly report required preconditions not currently satisfied and note where additional observations or actions are required.
draft.prompt: Your name is planner. Given the player's observations, create a candidate sequence of named actions with concrete object bindings that could achieve the goal. Mark conditional branches and required intermediate facts. Flag any reliance on bookkeeping shortcuts.

audit.system_prompt: You are an auditor responsible for temporal and causal integrity. Do not produce PDDL. Inspect the drafted plan and the observations. Remove or propose corrections for bookkeeping shortcuts, simultaneous-effect abuses, or inconsistent assumptions. Provide corrected precondition/effect lists and any constraints on action ordering required to preserve causality.
audit.prompt: Your name is auditor. Given the observation facts and planner draft, produce an audit report that corrects temporal inconsistencies, removes ad-hoc bookkeeping tokens, and supplies an explicit causal ordering where needed. Provide precise suggestions for how effects should be modeled temporally.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert PDDL integrator and generator targeting the FastDownwards solver. Produce a complete PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file compatible with FastDownwards. Keep multi-agent actions distinct and explicit. Integrate observations, plan skeletons, and auditor corrections. Enforce temporal causality by modeling ordering where simultaneous effects would be unsafe.
pddl.prompt: Your name is orchestrator. Integrate the player analysis, planner draft, and auditor report into a final PDDL domain and problem targeted to FastDownwards. Ensure types, predicates, action signatures, and all relevant initial facts and goal clauses are included. Avoid inventing additional objects. Keep agent-contributed actions distinct by prefixing action names with the contributor where helpful.
